topics.body:
Is is just me, or is Kojiro kind of a dick?

I think he _is_ a dick. Even though I kind of called her one, Hakase's not really _that_ bad. She's just a ditzy kid who's pretty much oblivious to the world around her, concerned with sweets and fun. Just like any little girl...who can built human-like robots. But she's not that bad.

I just don't like Kojiro. He's a dick for sure.
-And I'm only on EP2 still. Damn these episodes are LONG.-
